name: Dress Up Fun Fashion
description:
First game created by Johnny Whaam.

Easy and fun gameplay, just keep on pressing those buttons and enjoy expressing your creativity.

Be a fashion designer, combine around 250 clothing items and +40 hairstyles in an incredible number of possible combinations.

Photo button lets you take a photo and saves it to your Gallery. Dress up the girl, take a photo and then press the Gallery button. In there you can find and show to friends and family all your creative fashion combinations. Of course, there's also a Delete Photo button so you can easily delete photos at any time.

Dress Up Fun Fashion game features:
.....3 cheerful and beautiful girls
.....4 colorful backgrounds
.....over 40 hairstyles
and over 250 clothing items, various styles;
.....dresses, skirts, pants, shorts, pantyhose, tights, tops, shirts, T-shirts, jackets, gowns, gloves, shoes, sport shoes, glasses, necklaces, tiaras, headbands...

Thank you for downloading and playing the game, hope you enjoy it. Please rate, review and share this app :)
